## Biography

Emily Mayhew is a sensory scientist with an interest in measuring the modeling the relationship between chemistry and perception. She is currently an Assistant Professor in the Department of Food Science & Human Nutrition at Michigan State University. 

## Education

Ph.D. Food Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign, 2017

B.S. Chemistry, College of William & Mary, 2012


## Experience

Senior Associate Scientist, SC Johnson & Son, Inc., 2017-2018

Postdoctoral Fellow, Monell Chemical Senses Center, 2018-2021
